S.FORM: Nanum(Kuwaping a sowal: ) Nanum(nanom) hananay i caay kasasawaden tu remiremiad anu a waay ku nanum i caay ka kapah kunipalumaan nu mawmahay caay ku sasawaden numaudipay a maamaan i ni sangan nu wama i kakarayan Aray koliyol no nanum Nanom nika koliyol o nanom i fafaed ato la'eno no cikiw malalinalinah. kalaliyol no nanom, pakaynien no nanom malalood, maloso'ay, malarahod masasiroma kaira i masasiromaay a niyaro'. Talacowa micekeroh i roma romi'adan, i fafaeday no cikiw a nanom macekel mapararoyay, makahacecayay a nanom manga'ay pakonira sa a malalinah.
